thread.title: Meryl Streep mocks Trump’s ‘over-rated’ diss, slams President
thread.title_full: Meryl Streep mocks Trump’s ‘over-rated’ diss, slams President

author: PETER SBLENDORIO
title: Meryl Streep mocks Trump’s ‘over-rated’ diss, slams President
text:
Donald Trump in the White House 
The three-time Oscar winner was clear, however, in her mockery of Trump's assessment of her standing Hollywood. 
"Yes, I am the most overrated, over-decorated, and currently, over-berated actress… of my generation," Streep quipped at the gala. "But that is why you invited me here. Right?" 
Streep's latest Trump take-down comes a month after she ripped the President during an emotional acceptance speech for the Cecil B. DeMille lifetime achievement award at the Globes. President Trump called Streep “over-rated” last month. (NICHOLAS KAMM/AFP/Getty Images) 
"Hollywood is crawling with outsiders and foreigners, and if you kick us all out, you'll have nothing to watch except for football and mixed martial arts, which are not arts," she told the audience. 
Mark Hamill uses Joker's voice to read Trump's Meryl Streep tweet 
That inspired Trump to refer to her as "over-rated" in a tweet the following morning. 
Streep, who did not win a Golden Globe this year, is nominated for best actress at the Academy Awards later this month for her leading performance in "Florence Foster Jenkins." Join the Conversation:
